mapper.sql: lu.id, lu.username, lu.accountName, lu.description, lu.createTime, lu.status, lu.organization_id, lu.user_type, lo.name AS organization_name, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(name) FROM ly_role ly_role WHERE ly_role.id IN (SELECT roleId FROM ly_user_role WHERE userId = lu.id)) roleName
mapper.select:
select
FROM ly_user lu LEFT JOIN ly_organization lo ON lu.organization_id = lo.id where 1 = 1
and lu.organization_id = ${organizationId}
and lu.userName='${username}'
and lu.createTime >= '${createdatetimeStart}'
and lu.createTime <= '${createdatetimeStart}'
order by ${orderby}
